front.title: Considerations on IP Spatial Location Protocol Requirements

abstract.t: This document addresses those requirements for IP spatial locationprotocol that emerges from the situation where mobile hosts (MH) uselocation information in the inter-domain mobility management. While IPspatial location protocol has many other usage cases, this documentfocuses on the requirements for mobile IP device that needs to know thewhereabouts of IP subnetwork to be visited in order to prepare forhandoff. Three inter-technology handoff (ITHO) scenarios and the relatedproblems are presented, and the requirements for the systemarchitecture, terminal and IP spatial location protocol are outlined.
